title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message:
Hey guys i got this a1502 customer says track pad stopped working so cable was changed - went away sometime later stopped working again - changed trackpad - again after sometime come back - not working again. So I think this is an intermittent issue and its come in my hands now.

Right now completely working

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message:
Keyboard works, only trackpad issue?
I suppose you only refer to OSX.
Check if always works before login to OSX; try to acces boot menu.
Any liquid sign?

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message: No sign of liquid machine is very clean. i tried to close lid - put in sleep mode to see if problem will reoccur. I will try boot menu and yes osx.

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message: yes just tested in boot menu after few second trackpad its active. any ideas? also yes keyboard working.

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message:
Please specify...
Keyboard always work, even on OSX?

Trackpad always work on boot menu?
Only get trackpad issue sometime in OSX?

Before login to OSX, trackpad/keyboard connect with PCH through USB.
Once logged into OSX, SPI bus is activated.
If file vault is enabled, password screen will still use USB communication...

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message:
Keyboard always works even on OSX

Trackpad issue is sometime in OSX

Could this one be software related. Seen a lot of threads about track pad not working or becoming unresponsive on Mojave.

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message:
Test it with different OSX then.

Keyboard is connected to PCH through trackpad circuitry.
If it always works there is low probability of bad trackpad...

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message: My bad it's on high Sierra. Problem is I haven't even seen the issue replicate itself. I'm going off what customer says.

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message: Customer is probably wrong just saying. The trackpad cable is a recurring failing issue on these 4924 machines. I'd replace it again if necessary and just test it.

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message: yeh i feel that way - i had this machine for 3 days now and yet to see trackpad not working? :rolleyes:

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message:
Still not working with known good flex?
Test known good trackpad and flex at same time.

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message: No on this one trackpad is working but customer claims not working I been pulling my hair out trying to find why it wouldnt be working but so far after 3 days its always been working.

title: 820-4924-a trackpad intermittent
message: Now charge the client for some hair regeneration treatment :)
